practice_phrases.known: You would like something to drink
You would like a cup of coffee with milk
practice_phrases.target: 您想要一杯咖啡加牛奶

practice_phrases.known: You would like something to drink, that would be great
practice_phrases.target: 您想要喝点什么，那太好了

practice_phrases.known: I would like a cup of tea with milk please
practice_phrases.target: 我想要一杯茶加牛奶谢谢

practice_phrases.known: What would you like, tea or coffee, that would be great
practice_phrases.target: 您想要什么，茶还是咖啡，那太好了

practice_phrases.known: You would like what to drink
I would like what, coffee or tea
practice_phrases.target: 我想要什么，咖啡还是茶

practice_phrases.known: You would like what to drink please
I would like what, a cup of coffee or tea
practice_phrases.target: 我想要什么，一杯咖啡还是茶

practice_phrases.known: What would you like to drink, coffee or tea, that would be great
practice_phrases.target: 您想要喝什么，咖啡还是茶，那太好了

practice_phrases.known: What would you like to drink
What would you like, tea please
What would you like, coffee or tea
practice_phrases.target: 您想要什么，咖啡还是茶

practice_phrases.known: What would you like, I like coffee
practice_phrases.target: 您想要什么，我喜欢咖啡

practice_phrases.known: What would you like to drink, tea or coffee
practice_phrases.target: 您想要喝什么，茶还是咖啡

practice_phrases.known: What would you like, I can have a cup of tea
practice_phrases.target: 您想要什么，我可以要一杯茶

practice_phrases.known: What would you like to drink, I would like coffee with milk but without sugar
practice_phrases.target: 您想要喝什么，我想要咖啡加牛奶但不加糖
